info.name: Darkpixel
info.description: A custom CSS script to darken the Hypixel websites, including the forums, the store, and the support site. Simple and elegant, to the comfort of your eyes. Found a bug with Darkpixel or have a suggestion? Feel free to join us at Discord and tell us! https://forumpixel.glitch.me/discord IMPORTANT: Enable "Expose iframes" on your Stylus settings for full functionality.
info.additionalInfo: Changelog & Version History: CURRENT VERSION: v3.7.5 - Add support for the new api.hypixel.net page. v3.7 - Major fixes for new features and design changes on the forums after the maintenance. v3.6 - Now works with the new support.hypixel.net website, while still working on the old design at hypixel.kayako.com. A major revamp on how certain assets are loaded was also done to decrease the filesize. v3.5.1 - Added custom rating images for MVP++ Gold and Youtuber Redstone to better fit the style of the old ratings. Credits to @YourAverageName (https://hypixel.net/members/3562027/) for making the images! v3.5 - The style has been fixed after being broken by the forums update of December 23, also includes lots of bugfixes, QoL changes and restoring the old ratings since the new ones look terrible. Look on the forums thread for a more complete changelog. v3.4.9 - Added web.archive.org support for archived Hypixel pages, includes store and support archives. Also includes two minor bugfixes. This is potentially the final release due to the upcoming forums update, which is promised to have native dark theme. v3.4.5 - Turns out v3 was not as stable as I thought at all, especially with Hypixel updating their navigation bar. This update fixes several of the leftover bugs, and hopefully all of the new ones that came with the navigation bar update. v3.4 - Contains the final v3 bugfixes, this version is finally the first STABLE release since the website redesign, and it will remain to be the latest stable (v3.4.x may still happen with tiny bugfixes, to be still considered as stable). From this version on new Alpha/Beta versions (Android alpha releases/early v4 testing) will be released via GitHub through direct links, check the website or discord for more information! v3.3B - After a few months of Alpha testing, this is the first Beta release, to be followed soon by a stable release, fixes dozens of small visual bugs and glitches, hopefully fixes color overriding issues for good and adds store.hypixel.net support, along with other minor changes and preparation for the stable release. v3.2A - Fixed me being dumb and forgetting to upload a few pieces of code for improved icons and text color fixes on some spots. v3.1A - Improvements and small fixes, also including support.hypixel.net darkening now. (Still in Alpha, contains bugs) v3A - ALPHA TESTING VERSION OF THE HYPIXEL REDESIGN UPDATE, CONTAINS BUGS v2.2.2 - Temporary fix for ugly avatar position (reversed, fixed server side) v2.2.1 - Fixed True Black text styling not working with RGB v2.2 - Fixed True Black text not being turned white and dark themed Attachment Manager. v2.1 - Fixed main thread content overlapping search popup and dark themed the search calendar v2.0 - Fixed major bugs being reported since 1.1 and improved color contrast on sidebar (Fixed style images) v1.9 - Did a bunch of crap and upgrades I'm too lazy to list v1.8 - Small facebook iframe fixed along with several bugs + domain settings v1.7 - Major bugfixes + dark themed 404 page and RSS Feed (v1.7.1 - Fixed a typo or two) v1.6 - Added in a few community suggestions v1.5 - Minor iframe tweaks (v1.5.1 - Reverted this change) v1.4 - iframe bugfix and dark polls v1.3 - Dark iframes + bug fixes v1.2 - Fixed MORE bugs v1.1 - Fixed several bugs v1.0 - Initial release
